FareRuleText.Description:
BaggageFor ADT/CHD free baggage allowance --> 20Kg. For Infants free baggage allowance 10KG
RebookingRebooking Permitted. 30% of applicable fare will be applied as the penalty until one day prior to the departure before 12 noon. Any rebooking operation afterwards will be collecting 60% of the applicable fare as the penalty.
Cancellation/RefundCancellation permitted. 30% of applicable fare will be applied as the penalty until one day prior to the departure before 12 noon. Any cancellation operation after afterwards will be collecting 60% of the applicable fare as the penalty.
